name: Corporal Parker
description:
This game was made for the GrapeFruit GameJam #4, so all assets had to be made in 48 hours.

I'm not an artist, so making all of the textures etc. took far longer than i had anticipated, which lead to me running out of time in all other parts of the game.

Tools:

Engine: My own (based on OpenGL and win32)

3D Software: Blender and Materialize

2D Software: Photoshop

Audio Software: FL Studio and Audacity
